exercises.name: Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor. Push back up to the starting position.

exercises.name: Knee Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Start on your hands and knees. Lower your chest toward the floor while keeping your back straight. Push back up.

exercises.name: Incline Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Place hands on an elevated surface. Perform a push-up while keeping your body straight.

exercises.name: Wall Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Stand arm's length from a wall. Place hands on the wall and perform a push-up motion.

exercises.name: Diamond Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Form a diamond shape with your hands under your chest. Perform a push-up keeping elbows close to your body.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower your body as if sitting back into a chair. Keep your chest up and knees over toes. Return to standing.

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.instructions: Lean against a wall with your thighs parallel to the ground. Hold this position.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are bent at 90 degrees. Push back to start and alternate legs.

exercises.name: Reverse Lunges
exercises.instructions: Step backward with one leg and lower your hips. Push through your front foot to return to standing.

exercises.name: Step-Ups
exercises.instructions: Step onto an elevated platform with one foot, then bring the other foot up. Step back down and alternate.

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat. Lift your hips toward the ceiling, squeezing your glutes at the top.

exercises.name: Single Leg Glute Bridges
exercises.instructions: Perform a glute bridge with one leg extended straight out. Alternate legs.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold a push-up position with your arms straight or on your forearms. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.instructions: Lie on your side and prop yourself up on one forearm. Lift your hips to form a straight line. Hold, then switch sides.

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.instructions: Lie on your back with arms extended toward the ceiling and knees bent at 90 degrees. Lower opposite arm and leg toward the floor, then return and alternate.

exercises.name: Bird Dog
exercises.instructions: Start on hands and knees. Extend opposite arm and leg simultaneously. Hold briefly, return, and alternate.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.instructions: Start in a plank position. Quickly alternate driving your knees toward your chest.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.instructions: From standing, drop into a squat, kick your feet back into a plank, perform a push-up, jump feet forward, and jump up with arms overhead.

exercises.name: Squat Jumps
exercises.instructions: Perform a squat, then explode upward into a jump. Land softly and immediately go into the next squat.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.instructions: Run in place while driving your knees as high as possible. Pump your arms to match the rhythm.

exercises.name: Jumping Jacks
exercises.instructions: Jump while spreading your legs and raising your arms overhead. Jump back to starting position.

exercises.name: Tricep Dips
exercises.instructions: Place hands on a chair or bench behind you. Lower your body by bending your elbows, then push back up.

exercises.name: Superman
exercises.instructions: Lie face down with arms extended. Lift your arms, chest, and legs off the ground simultaneously. Hold briefly, then lower.

exercises.name: Reverse Snow Angels
exercises.instructions: Lie face down with arms by your sides. Lift your chest and sweep your arms in an arc from hips to overhead.

exercises.name: Calf Raises
exercises.instructions: Stand on the edge of a step with heels hanging off. Rise up on your toes, then lower back down below the step level.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunches
exercises.instructions: Lie on your back with hands behind your head. Bring opposite elbow to opposite knee while extending the other leg. Alternate in a pedaling motion.

exercises.name: Russian Twists
exercises.instructions: Sit with knees bent and feet off the floor. Lean back slightly and rotate your torso side to side, touching the ground beside you.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Rows
exercises.instructions: Hinge forward at the hips with a dumbbell in one hand. Pull the weight up to your ribcage, squeezing your shoulder blade. Lower and repeat.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height. Press them overhead until arms are fully extended. Lower back to shoulders.

exercises.name: Pike Push-Ups
exercises.instructions: Start in a downward dog position. Bend your elbows to lower your head toward the floor, then push back up.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curls
exercises.instructions: Hold dumbbells at your sides with palms facing forward. Curl the weights up toward your shoulders, then lower slowly.

exercises.name: Goblet Squats
exercises.instructions: Hold a dumbbell or kettlebell at chest level. Perform a squat while keeping your chest up and the weight close to your body.

exercises.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
exercises.instructions: On hands and knees, alternate between arching your back (cow) and rounding it (cat). Move slowly and breathe deeply.

exercises.name: Child's Pose
exercises.instructions: Kneel and sit back on your heels. Stretch your arms forward on the floor and rest your forehead down. Breathe deeply.

exercises.name: Downward Dog
exercises.instructions: Form an inverted V with your body. Press your hands and feet into the floor while lifting your hips high.
